page.title: 12BOWDON VALE CONVENT
page.content: Framland extends to the north of the Bollin in the N.W. of the Survey area and set in pleasant surroundings, in sight of some beautiful cottages, is the{Vale Convent.}Established as a convent in l930, this quiet, secluded, house was converted into a nursing home for the elderly with its purpose built chapel dedicated to the founder of this R.C. Order of nuns,{Saint {Emilia de Vialar.}The nuns are a pleasant and hard working group who dedicate themselves to the care of the elderly and maintain their house in excellent condition. They are an energetic group who mention that they have little spare time for hobbies but are pleased that their old fashioned, long black, habits have been replaced by a grey knee length dress. They also tell the story of a{miraculous cure}of an ailing nun:devotion being rewarded!
